name: succinyl-CoA:enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine S-succinyltransferase
definition: Succinyl-CoA + Enzyme N6-(dihydrolipoyl)lysine <=> CoA + [Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase] S-succinyldihydrolipoyllysine
comment: 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex:dihydrolipoyllysine-residue succinyltransferase a part of multi-step reaction (see R08549, R01700+R02570+R07618) following after R01700
